text.div:
Neisseria Gonorrhoeae Tests

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    21414-8 Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA [Presence] in Cervical mucus by Probe and target amplification method
    21415-5 Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA [Presence] in Urethra by Probe and target amplification method
    21416-3 Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA [Presence] in Urine by Probe and target amplification method
    24111-7 Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Probe and target amplification method
    32198-4 Neisseria gonorrhoeae rRNA [Presence] in Cervix by DNA probe
    32199-2 Neisseria gonorrhoeae rRNA [Presence] in Urethra by DNA probe
    32705-6 Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA [Presence] in Vaginal fluid by Probe and target amplification method
    43305-2 Neisseria gonorrhoeae rRNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Probe and target amplification method
    43403-5 Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Probe and signal amplification method
    47387-6 Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA [Presence] in Genital specimen by Probe and target amplification method
    5028-6 Neisseria gonorrhoeae rRNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by DNA probe
    50388-8 Neisseria gonorrhoeae rRNA [Presence] in Cervix by Probe and target amplification method
    53879-3 Neisseria gonorrhoeae rRNA [Presence] in Vaginal fluid by Probe and target amplification method
    53927-0 Neisseria gonorrhoeae rRNA [Presence] in Urethra by Probe and target amplification method
    6487-3 Neisseria gonorrhoeae Ag [Presence] in Genital specimen by Immunoassay
    688-2 Neisseria gonorrhoeae [Presence] in Cervix by Organism specific culture
    691-6 Neisseria gonorrhoeae [Presence] in Genital specimen by Organism specific culture
    692-4 Neisseria gonorrhoeae [Presence] in Genital lochia by Organism specific culture
    693-2 Neisseria gonorrhoeae [Presence] in Vaginal fluid by Organism specific culture
    698-1 Neisseria gonorrhoeae [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
